site.title: L'Ensoleillade - Eco-Friendly Cottage in Dordogne
site.description: L'Ensoleillade, a 19m² eco-friendly cottage with 18m² terrace in the heart of Dordogne.
site.keywords: eco-friendly cottage, Dordogne, permaculture, Saint-Léon-sur-Vézère, tiny house, nature vacation

hero.title: L'Ensoleillade
hero.subtitle: Eco-Friendly Cottage in the Heart of Dordogne
hero.description: A 19m² wooden cottage with 18m² terrace in a natural setting in Dordogne.

accommodation.title: Your Accommodation
accommodation.ecological_construction_intro: Built with natural, organic and local materials, in a spirit of sustainable development.
accommodation.ecological_construction_insulation: High-density wood wool insulation for optimal thermal comfort.
accommodation.ecological_construction_water: Natural wastewater treatment by phyto-purification for minimal environmental impact.
accommodation.solar_panels: Solar panels to offset air conditioning
accommodation.phyto_message: Please use organic cleaning and hygiene products. Our phyto-purification system thanks you.
accommodation.minimum_nights: 3 nights (low season) · 5 nights (school holidays) · 7 nights (high season)
accommodation.accessibility_message: The cottage is <u>not suitable for people with reduced mobility</u> (access via 3 exterior steps).
accommodation.solar_panels: Solar panels to offset air conditioning
accommodation.ducks_message: <u>We cannot welcome pets</u> due to the presence of 2 free-roaming Indian Runner ducks: Puce and Bo. Thank you for your understanding.
accommodation.host_proximity_message: The owner lives in the neighboring house and remains available to welcome you and answer your questions throughout your stay, while being discreet.

amenities.title: Amenities & Services
amenities.subtitle: Modern comfort in an ecological setting

kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.dining_desc: On the terrace and in the garden

basic_services.title: Please Note
basic_services.bed_linen_details: 1 fitted sheet, 1 duvet cover or flat sheet, 1 pillowcase
basic_services.holiday_insurance_desc: Your home insurance may also include this coverage.
basic_services.cancellation_insurance_intro: For your peace of mind, we recommend:
basic_services.cancellation_insurance_disclaimer: (We are not affiliated with this service)

location.title: Location
location.subtitle: Saint-Léon-sur-Vézère, Dordogne
location.description: Located in the heart of Périgord Noir, L'Ensoleillade offers you privileged access to the treasures of Périgord.
location.pickup_service: Possibility to pick you up at the station
location.lascaux_desc: Exceptional cave art and prehistoric sites
location.canoeing_desc: Canoeing down the Vézère and hiking

activities.title: Activities & Discoveries
activities.description: Region rich in history, culture and nature
